segments.text: I'm just watching this whole scene, and my heart is pounding a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are so many things that could go wrong here, I see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water covering the floor is a serious slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Anyone could lose their footing on that wet surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's that stool the boy is standing on; it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilted back, almost ready to give way beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily fall and hit his head or break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness to all of this is simply astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the puddle, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the damage to the kitchen, too, with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet domestic scene is actually fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so nervous just observing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before a real accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of those children falling fills me with dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a recipe for disaster brewing right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR
